steps.name: Positioning
steps.text: Position yourself in front of the dog

steps.name: Lure him
steps.text: Take treat and hold it in front of your dogs nose. Draw your dogs nose up and towards back. As his head goes back, he will naturally sit

steps.name: Click
steps.text: At the moment his rear touches ground click and treat him

steps.name: Cue
steps.text: Once your dog starts sitting reliably start introducing cue. For example 'Sit Luna'

steps.name: Generalization
steps.text: Try giving her cue in different locations so she can reliably sit in every situation
